message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I think you'll be very interested in. It's worth a lot to me, so I'm asking for $13,000. Let me know your thoughts.
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer. While I'm interested in the product, $13,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000. What do you think?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is a little low for me. I'm willing to come down to $12,000 to make this deal happen. This reflects the value of the product and gives us both a good deal. Let me know if you're interested.
